item.title: Can anyone give me an npc spawning command?
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

} /*else if

(command.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try {
int newNPC =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC <=

10000 && newNPC >= 0) {

server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 1),

heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0);

sendMessage(“You spawn an npc”);
} else {

sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}
}*/
else if (command.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try
{
int newNPC =

Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC >= 0)
{
server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC,

absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX

  • -10, absY + -10, 1,

server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
sendMessage("You spawn an

npc");
} else {

sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}

item.title: Can anyone give me an npc spawning command?
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

else if (command.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try
{
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));
if (newNPC >= 0)
{
server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
sendMessage(“You spawn an npc”);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}

Hope that will help.
